jumbotron.heading: an open-source desktop application to manage your private keys

features.control: complete control over the sensitive information
features.vault: a vault which never transmits private data
features.storage: local host storage of the keys to interact with the project

headings.qualities: a perfect solution for blockchain-based projects

paragraphs.about: KeyChain is a standalone app for signing transactions and generating key pairs. It stores private keys in an isolated environment where no logger, debugger or spyware can intercept them because of the three-layer security protecting each action of the system. KeyChain supports transactions from and to various blockchains, including Ethereum and Ethereum classic, Litecoin, Bitcoin, and Bitshares.

qualities.protocol: instead of losing time to build the protocol for storing user’s private keys, use the KeyChain
qualities.code: our code is open-source and available to you now
qualities.offer: offer truly decentralized product for Web.3 and change the world of institutional control

paragraphs.linuxSecurity: We look past standard solutions to data protection. As it is well-known, the longer the path, the more chances there are of a password being intercepted. To ensure safe operations in Unix-like OS, we have created a shortcut from you entering a passphrase to the KeyChain processing it. Instead of receiving a passphrase through the X-server, KeyChain gets it directly from the keyboard driver. We exclude the weakest link (X-server) from the process, thus minimizing the risks to your key storage.

testimonials.question: what did they say about our products?

integration.for_dev: if you are a developer who is ready to give KeyChain a go - take a look at our set of simple guides and documentation  that we have created specially for you.

icoadmin.name: ICOadm.in
icoadmin.about: Superior Software Platform for ICO/STO launch
icoadmin.feedback: A free, open-source application to store private keys? - Yes, we want it! KeyChain helped solve many security dilemmas for our clients.
icoadmin.author: Sabir Magdeev

swap.name: Swap.Online
swap.about: Multi-cryptocurrency wallet powered by Atomic Swaps
swap.feedback: KeyChain is a perfect solution for our project. We can assure our users that their assets are stored safely.
swap.author: Alexander Noxon

jurry.name: Jury.Online
jurry.feedback: KeyChain is incredibly simple to use. No complicated integration processes and no headaches because of  stolen keys.
jurry.author: Igor Mironenko

velvet.name: Velvet.Exchange
velvet.feedback: We wanted to build the exchange which doesn’t store our clients keys. KeyChain solved this issue for us and now we our proud users of it.
